name: Day of apocalypse:Escape from Earth
description:
ATOMIC FABRIK GAMES IN STEAM:

  1. Project First Contact: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/...
  2. The Last Hope Trump vs Mafia http://store.steampowered.com/app/581030
  3. The Last Hope http://store.steampowered.com/app/522570

Day of apocalypse:Escape from Earth - a devastating pandemic sweeps through Earth, and one by one, all peoples died and you are the one survival. You have a limited time to escape from your home,Earth. Without food or water, society collapses into chaos. You must to escape,you are the hope!

Features
  • GREAT SOUNTRACK,ONE OF THE BEST SOUNDRACK IN A GAME FROM THE BEGINNING OF 2016!!!
  • A lot of levels
  • You must to explore
  • System solar
  • Forests
  • Deserts
  • The North Pole
  • Glaciers
  • Islands
  • Citites
  • Snow
  • Ancient Egypt
  • Ocens and lakes
  • In some levels you will be a first person shooter,in others levels I will help you with a car,a CAMARO BRAND NEW!!!
  • Jungle
  • Hours of gameplay

IF YOU WANT TO ESCAPE YOU WILL PASS THROUGH ALL THESE ATTEMPTS

If you have some question ask me(i respond at most of the questions in Download & install instructions(so after you download game)

GOOD LUCK!!!

Game is very good optimisated(it has 6 levels of graphics)

I run game on ultra settings with 30-60 fps on my low end pc:

DUAL CORE GT 520 4gb ram

SOON MORE UPTADES,MORE LEVELS,MORE LIFE,MORE DLCs!!!
